EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

AccountsPayableCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Current
AccountsPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxesCurre.label: Accrual for Taxes Other than Income Taxes, Current
AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxesCurre.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for real and property taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AdvanceRent.label: Advance Rent
AdvanceRent.description: Amount at the balance sheet date that has been received by the entity that represents rents paid in advance.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsCurrent.label: Assets, Current
AssetsCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold, or consumed within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsHeldForSaleAtCarryingValue.label: Assets Held-for-sale, at Carrying Value (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
AssetsHeldForSaleAtCarryingValue.description: Represents the sum of the carrying value of all the Assets Held-for-Sale at the balance sheet date.

AssetsHeldForSaleCurrent.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Current (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
AssetsHeldForSaleCurrent.description: Current assets (normally turning over within one year or one business cycle if longer) that are held for sale apart from normal operations and anticipated to be sold within one year.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CostOfRealEstateSales.label: Cost of Real Estate Sales (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
CostOfRealEstateSales.description: Reflects for the period the total of the carrying amount of the commercial, industrial and residential land and buildings sold plus certain overhead and other costs incurred to place the real estate in saleable condition, capitalized interest costs in the properties sold, and inventory impairment losses recognized. This element would most likely be used by an entity whose principal activities involve real estate or which has significant real estate operations.

CostOfServicesMaintenanceCosts.label: Cost of Services, Maintenance Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
CostOfServicesMaintenanceCosts.description: Maintenance costs incurred and directly related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period.

DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalO.label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax
DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalO.description: Amount after tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDisco.label: Discontinued Operation, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operation, before Income Tax
DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDisco.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Income (Loss)
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of operating income (loss) attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartner.label: Distribution Made to Member or Limited Partner, Cash Distributions Paid (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartner.description: The amount of cash distributions paid to a common shareholder or unit-holder by a LLC or LP.

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Due to Related Parties, Current
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties. For classified balance sheets, represents the current portion of such liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

GainLossOnDispositionOfRealEstateDiscont.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Real Estate, Discontinued Operations
GainLossOnDispositionOfRealEstateDiscont.description: Amount of difference between the carrying amount and the sales price of real estate properties sold as part of discontinued operations.

GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties
GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of real estate or properties that were intended to be sold or held for capital appreciation or rental income. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfInvestmentRealEstate.label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Investment Real Estate
GainsLossesOnSalesOfInvestmentRealEstate.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of real estate owned for investment purposes.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.label: General Partners' Capital Account
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

GeneralPartnersContributedCapital.label: General Partners' Contributed Capital
GeneralPartnersContributedCapital.description: The amount of capital contributed by the general partner.

GeneralPartnersCumulativeCashDistributio.label: General Partners' Cumulative Cash Distributions
GeneralPartnersCumulativeCashDistributio.description: Aggregate cumulative cash distributions made to the general partner.

GeneralPartnersCumulativeNetIncome.label: General Partners' Cumulative Earnings
GeneralPartnersCumulativeNetIncome.description: Aggregate cumulative earnings allocated to the general partner based on the sharing of income or losses between general and limited partners as specified in the partnership agreement, excluding any priority income allocations resulting from incentive distributions or any special earnings allocations.

ImpairmentOfRealEstate.label: Impairment of Real Estate
ImpairmentOfRealEstate.description: The charge against earnings in the period to reduce the carrying amount of real property to fair value.

IncomeLossAttributableToParent.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToParent.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsInclud.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsInclud.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations including portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.description: The amount of Income or Loss from continuing operations available to each limited partnership unit in a publicly trade limited partnership or master limited partnership (MLP) during the reporting period. Limited partners have limited liability and do not manage the partnership.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder in a publicly trade limited partnership (LP) or master limited partnership (MLP).

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: The amount of income (loss) from disposition of discontinued operations available to each limited partnership unit during the reporting period, net of tax.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of gain (loss) on disposal of discontinued operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

IncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributableTo.label: Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, before Tax
IncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributableTo.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliates.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Affiliates
IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliates.description: The increase (decrease) in obligations owed to an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Current Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in current assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInPropertyAndOtherTaxesP.label: Increase (Decrease) in Property and Other Taxes Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInPropertyAndOtherTaxesP.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of cash payments due to taxing authorities for non-income-related taxes.

InterestIncomeOther.label: Interest Income, Other
InterestIncomeOther.description: Amount of interest income earned from interest bearing assets classified as other.

InventoryRealEstateLandAndLandDevelopmen.label: Inventory, Real Estate, Land and Land Development Costs
InventoryRealEstateLandAndLandDevelopmen.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date, net of valuation allowances and impairment losses, of costs of land expected to be developed in the near term plus capitalized costs of development, for purposes of selling completed units to home buyers or commercial or industrial entities..

InvestmentIncomeInterest.label: Investment Income, Interest
InvestmentIncomeInterest.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LiabilitiesCurrent.label: Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

LiabilitiesOfAssetsHeldForSale.label: Liabilities of Assets Held-for-sale (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
LiabilitiesOfAssetsHeldForSale.description: Liability (such as a mortgage) related to a disposal group that is held for sale and anticipated to be sold in less than one year. The liability is expected to be discharged as part of the plan of sale for the asset.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsAuthor.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Authorized
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsAuthor.description: The number of limited partner units authorized to be issued.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Issued
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued.description: The number of limited partner units issued.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.description: The number of limited partner units outstanding.

LimitedPartnersContributedCapital.label: Limited Partners' Contributed Capital
LimitedPartnersContributedCapital.description: The amount of capital contributed by the limited partners.

LimitedPartnersCumulativeCashDistributio.label: Limited Partners' Cumulative Cash Distributions
LimitedPartnersCumulativeCashDistributio.description: Aggregate cumulative cash distributions made to the limited partners.

LimitedPartnersCumulativeNetIncome.label: Limited Partners' Cumulative Earnings
LimitedPartnersCumulativeNetIncome.description: Aggregate cumulative earnings allocated to the limited partners based on the sharing of income or losses between general and limited partners as specified in the partnership agreement, excluding any priority income allocations resulting from incentive distributions or special earnings allocations.

LimitedPartnersOfferingCosts.label: Limited Partners' Offering Costs
LimitedPartnersOfferingCosts.description: The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the limited partners.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to General Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to general partners.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to Limited Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to limited partners.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingGeneralPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding General Partnership Unit (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingGeneralPartne.description: Net income (loss) allocated to each outstanding general partnership unit.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingGeneralPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding General Partnership Unit, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingGeneralPartne.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to general partnership (GP) unit-holder.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Net income (loss) allocated to each outstanding limited partnership unit.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to outstanding limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Lease Revenue
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.description: The total amount of revenue recognized for the period from operating leases, including minimum lease revenue, contingent revenue, percentage revenue and sublease revenue.

OtherAssetsCurrent.label: Other Assets, Current
OtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of current assets classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distributions
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountTreasuryUnitsPurch.label: Partners' Capital Account, Treasury Units, Purchased
PartnersCapitalAccountTreasuryUnitsPurch.description: Value of units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasury.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Treasury Units Purchased
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasury.description: Units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets.label: Payments to Develop Real Estate Assets
PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets.description: Payments to develop real estate assets is the process of adding improvements on or to a parcel of land. Such improvements may include drainage, utilities, subdividing, access, buildings, and any combination of these elements; and are generally classified as cash flow from investing activities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow from the sale of formerly productive land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.description: Cash received from the sale of real estate that is held for investment, that is, it is part of an investing activity during the period.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

RealEstateCostOfRealEstateSold.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Cost of Investment in Real Estate Sold
RealEstateCostOfRealEstateSold.description: Amount of real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis.label: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate, Federal Income Tax Basis
RealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis.description: Cost basis of real estate investments for federal income tax purposes for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateImprovements.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Improvements
RealEstateImprovements.description: Amount of increase in real estate investments related to improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateRevenueNet.label: Real Estate Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RealEstateRevenueNet.description: The aggregate revenue from real estate operations during the reporting period.

SellingAndMarketingExpense.label: Selling and Marketing Expense
SellingAndMarketingExpense.description: The aggregate total amount of expenses directly related to the marketing or selling of products or services.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.
